topics.body:
So I just bought GTA V for PC, and I got it retail because my net is shit.
But guess what? you can't activate it on Steam. I'm really fucking pissed right now. I have all of my other GTA games on Steam and if I would've known (which btw I shouldn't have to fucking check before buying) I would've just bought a digital copy. I hate you Rockstar.
